lyrics:
I can remember when 
We had
We had it all
(Reminisce on the love we had)
You and I
You and I
(Reminisce on the love we had)

You know 
You know we had it all
You and I
(Reminisce on the love we had)

Chorus
Let's make the time tonight
While the feelings right
Reminisce on the love we had
Let's make the time tonight 
While the feelings right
Reminisce on the love we had

Verse 1
I know that we've been here before
The candle light and you walking softly through my door
Come on in my sweet 
How have you been?
Your so nice but tonight 
We're gonna be more than just friends
I recall the days and ways of love we made
I still feel the heat when we shared each other
Dont you feel the magic 
The mystery's in the air
Lets go down to lover's lane 
With the love we shared

Chorus
Verse 2
I can see you standing there alone 
Like an angel 
Tryin' to find his way home
I don't remember how we fell apart
Here we are again, come on
Right into my heart
I recall the days in ways of love we made
I still feel the heat when we shared each other
Don't you feel the magic
The mystery's in the air
Let's go down to lover's lane 
With the love we shared

Chorus

Make the time tonight
The feeling's oh so right
Reminisce on the love we had
Make the time tonight
Make the time tonight
The feeling's oh so right
Reminisce on the love we had
Make the time tonight

Let's make the time tonight
Feelin' is oh so right
Reminisce on the love we had
Make the time tonight
Let's make the time tonight
Feelin' is oh so right
Reminisce on the love we had
Make the time tonight

Baby
Reminisce
I know we been here before
Some candle light and you walking softly through my door
Come on in my sweet
Tonight we're gonna be more than friends
Fellings right my, my
Sweet baby, baby, baby
I can see you standing there like an angel
Oooh boy, oooh reminisce 
Reminisce on the love we had
